thread.title: Ground News - Spring storm could bring more than a foot of snow to northern Maine
thread.title_full: Ground News - Spring storm could bring more than a foot of snow to northern Maine

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Spring storm could bring more than a foot of snow to northern Maine
text:
Summary by Ground News A significant winter storm is headed to Maine for Saturday with heavy snow, mix, and rain expected through the day. Friday will be nice and quiet, and a lot less windy. We'll see sunshine the first half of the day with more clouds through the afternoon. Highs will be in the mid to upper 30s. Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
Bangor Daily News Lean Left High Factuality Spring storm could bring more than a foot of snow to northern Maine A significant winter storm is headed to Maine for Saturday with heavy snow, mix, and rain expected through the day. Travel is likely to be impacted. Friday will be nice and quiet, and a lot less windy. We’ll see sunshine the first half of the day with more clouds through the afternoon. Highs will be in the mid to upper 30s. Timing Snow will begin very early Saturday, in the 3 a.m. to 5 a.m. timeframe. Snow, mix, and rain will continue the entire…
